医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
专家警告称，改变捐赠者匿名法的新提案可能会增加不一致和不公平现象两位该领域的专家警告说，修改英国保护精子和卵子捐赠者匿名法律的新提案“将增加许多捐赠者受孕的人的不一致和不公平”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-proposals-to-change-donor-anonymity-laws-may-increase-inconsistency-and-unfairness-experts-warn.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-proposals-to-change-donor-anonymity-laws-may-increase-inconsistency-and-unfairness-experts-warn.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b917ce3-f3bc-40de-9311-18af55360ed0 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 03:12:00 -0500 New proposals to change donor anonymity laws may increase inconsistency and unfairness, experts warn
新图谱描绘了早期人类肢体的细胞景观人类的手指和脚趾不会向外生长；相反，它们是从一个更大的基芽中形成的，中间的细胞会退去，露出下面的数字。这是科学家们首次捕捉到的许多过程之一，揭示了整个发育中的人类肢体的空间细胞图谱，并在空间和时间上进行了解析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-atlas-characterizes-cellular-landscape-of-the-early- human-limb.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-atlas-characterizes-cellular-landscape-of-the-early- human-limb.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=246b9a23-76b2-40c3-be19-5bd63dd07648 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 03:07:00 -0500 New atlas characterizes cellular landscape of the early human limb
开创性的在线社区将全世界的早衰症患者联系起来一个突破性的在线社区已经推出，让患有罕见疾病早衰症的人们能够进行交流，无论他们身在何处或使用何种语言。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Groundwriting-online-community-connects-Progeria-病人-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Groundwriting-online-community-connects-Progeria-病人-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70352d9e-48d7-4c28-b399-9f5178fdd3b6 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 03:05:00 -0500 Groundbreaking online community connects Progeria patients worldwide
研究人员开发出新型外泌体药物递送系统来治疗阿尔茨海默病香港浸会大学（HKBU）领导的研究团队开发了一种治疗阿尔茨海默病（AD）的新型药物输送系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Researchers-develop-novel-exosome-based-drug-delivery-system-to-treat-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Researchers-develop-novel-exosome-based-drug-delivery-system-to-treat-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e57dc5ee-e8ae-45d2-bc7c-6256234b7971 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 03:03:00 -0500 Researchers develop novel exosome-based drug delivery system to treat Alzheimer's disease
新地图为神经发育障碍和癌症的潜在机制提供了宝贵的见解科学家们创建了第一个广泛的图谱，显示所有可能的遗传变化如何影响 DDX3X 基因的健康，从而为神经发育障碍和癌症的潜在机制提供有价值的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-map-offers-valuable-insights-into-the-underlying-mechanisms-of-neurodevelopmental-disorders-and-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/New-map-offers-valuable-insights-into-the-underlying-mechanisms-of-neurodevelopmental-disorders-and-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c03e063-58ec-4dd2-b459-38f0964aab82 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 03:01:00 -0500 New map offers valuable insights into the underlying mechanisms of neurodevelopmental disorders and cancer
心脏基金会祝贺澳大利亚政府通过新的烟草控制立法心脏基金会欢迎议会今天通过《2023 年公共卫生（烟草和其他产品）法案》，这是预防和进一步减少烟草产品和尼古丁成瘾对人们心脏健康造成危害的一项关键行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Heart-Foundation-congratulates-the-Australian-Government-for-passing-of-new-tobacco-control-legislation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Heart-Foundation-congratulates-the-Australian-Government-for-passing-of-new-tobacco-control-legislation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee918dc9-b7bd-4e4b-a798-fa5d2c4086f0 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 02:58:00 -0500 Heart Foundation congratulates the Australian Government for passing of new tobacco control legislation
2 期试验数据显示酰亚胺酶在 GBS 患者中的安全性、耐受性和有效性Hansa Biopharma 今天宣布了 15-HMedIdeS-09 2 期试验的积极高水平数据，该数据表明，在标准护理之前给药时，imlifidase 是安全的且耐受性良好，包括疾病相关疗效指标的快速改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Phase-2-trial-data-shows-safety-tolerability-and-efficacy-of-imlifidase-in-GBS-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Phase-2-trial-data-shows-safety-tolerability-and-efficacy-of-imlifidase-in-GBS-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07a46046-a144-4c8e-b77b-85440d83e506 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 02:57:00 -0500 Phase 2 trial data shows safety, tolerability and efficacy of imlifidase in GBS patients
专家表示，“顽皮但美味”的圣诞食品有助于实现更好的胆固醇平衡最后，有一个关于我们最喜欢的圣诞食物的好消息。一位领先的测试专家透露，一顿包含所有（好吧，大部分）配菜的火鸡餐和传统甜点可以降低您的低密度脂蛋白“坏”胆固醇水平，并提高您的高密度脂蛋白好胆固醇的比例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/e28098Naughty-but-nicee28099-Christmas-foods-can-help-achieve-a-better-balance-of-cholesterol-expert-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/e28098Naughty-but-nicee28099-Christmas-foods-can-help-achieve-a-better-balance-of-cholesterol-expert-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e3bd6dd-985a-4a82-bc47-0ef0b0540e66 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 02:53:00 -0500 ‘Naughty but nice’ Christmas foods can help achieve a better balance of cholesterol, expert says
具有高生物利用度的纯净虾青素可以安全地对抗炎症，从而延长寿命AX3 Life 宣布了与其长寿补充剂 AX3® Bio-Pure 虾青素相关的突破性寿命延长发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Highly-bioavailable-pure-form-of-astaxanthin-safely-fights-inflammaging-to-improve-lifespan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Highly-bioavailable-pure-form-of-astaxanthin-safely-fights-inflammaging-to-improve-lifespan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06e38881-cf32-4fbe-a2e4-432aa802b419 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 02:51:00 -0500 Highly bioavailable, pure form of astaxanthin safely fights inflammaging to improve lifespan
过程拉曼光谱的小分子应用在本次采访中，Thermo Fisher Scientific 的 Kevin Broadbelt 讨论了过程拉曼光谱的小分子应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Small-molecule-applications-of-process-Raman-spectroscopy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231211/Small-molecule-applications-of-process-Raman-spectroscopy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43c71600-7eac-4d6a-8e70-5e7662623853 Mon, 11 Dec 2023 02:48:00 -0500 Small molecule applications of process Raman spectroscopy
